After switching to PC after console is a very good upgrade but it's still DBD
Tirando que o jogo é totalmente killer-sided, é um bom jogo e bem interessante.

**DISCLAIMER**
I've put in probably 1000+ hours in total across PC & Console.

Dead by Daylight is a flawed game. It's a flawed game that suffers from having no real competition. At its core, its a unique, super fun experience that gets ruined by the community. Most players you come across WILL be toxic & they WILL try to ruin your experience. Unfortunately, there's nothing you can do about that. Dead by Daylight is a game where your fun is based off how well you do once you get past the horror stage.

This game has changed a whole lot over the years & I can say right now that I would recommend this game to almost anyone... two years ago. I say this because my lord the community has devolved into a league of legends level shithole during that time & I'd argue that there are some killers & survivors with abilities & perks that make this game an absolute hellscape to balance. 

Not to mention how the overall gameplay direction has shifted over the years. DBD used to be a game where the smartest killer / survivor wins the match. The name of the game used to be knowledge and use of jungle gyms & mind games but now, there are killers that get 50/50 scenarios & 9 times out of 10 will get a free hit. (not to mention the absolutely mindboggling killer, Deathslinger. Not sure why he was even considered for the game as he has a fucking rifle but anyway.)

I simply can't recommend this game to the average gamer as this game can be extremely unbalanced and downright not fun at times. I recommend this game to anyone who will exclusively play with friends OR anyone who will play killer often & doesn't mind buying a couple DLCs.
Game is super grindy as fuck and it'll take forever to get new survivors and killers unless you buy them. This is the type of practice I'd see in a free-to-play game.

I really enjoy the cooperative approach to this game. You really have to work as a team for the best results. It's great to get into the spooky mood and generally an approachable horror game. I think this would be a good game for people who are interested in getting into horror games because of the simplicity of the game mechanics along with a fun character selection and beautiful animation!

cry

earn bloodpoints

get more killers

beat up the same survivors

10/10 game great emotional rollercoaster

The best asymmetrical PvP game currently. Great for fans of horror, you get to play either as a team of survivors or a killer that can be either original concepts or licensed from movie and game franchises. Good fun all around.
The community can be toxic as any other multiplayer game, but chat is only available post match and is entirely optional and can be disabled. Don't let any pre conception of the community turn you off the game.

Dead by daylight é um jogo que comprei esses dias e até agora tô me divertindo bastante. Ele é um jogo que pode garantir sua diversão por muito tempo, Da um certo medo quando seu coração começa a bater conforme o assassino vai se aproximando, isso é muito legal! Cada golpe que você dá em um sobrevivente de assassino, é como se você tivesse dando um tapa na cara da pessoa na vida real. tem como você fazer Builds com cada personagem e assassino onde modifica completamente o gameplay. Tem modo ranqueado, níveis de jogador, ainda não sei se é equilibrado corretamente... ainda tenho que jogar mais pra ver.
Recomendo que você compre o pacote com a DLC Stranger Things,já que vai sair da loja dia 17 de novembro, e você nunca mais poderá comprar. Jogue com amigos, mas caso nao tenha, relaxa, pois vai gostar assim mesmo.

As a horror fanatic, this game is right up my alley. Seeing as they have added characters from my childhood brings a lot of nostalgia (Especially PInhead) . The game itself is great as well, the objectives are quite straight forward but I'm pleased with the level of difficulty, especially with the very random matchmaking. I love that someone who is starting out can be placed with someone who is incredibly experienced. I think it's cool because that's what adds the challenge to the game. 
Would I call this game "scary?" It really just depends on the player. As someone who loves horror, I have way more fun than actually feeling scared but I still love the feeling of unease and that "edge of the seat" rush I get when a killer is approaching. Overall, I would recommend this game to absolutely anyone. It's fun especially to play with friends!
Very nice yes. Much frustration yes. Still having fun except when I'm not. Thank you for coming to my TED talk.

If you're a killer main, you're gonna wanna die.

If you're a survivor main, you're gonna wanna die.

If you play this game, you're gonna wanna die... but let's just get one more game in!


Dead By Daylight is the perfect love-letter to all horror films, games, and possibly other forms of horror media! Licensed agreements for different horror killers and media truly make this feel like Super Slash Brothers!

It's got something for everyone, too! If you're a sadist, you're gonna want to play survivor and click your flashlight at the killer at every given chance! If you're a masochist, then boy oh boy is the killer role PERFECT for you as you struggle to get kills and have players in end-game chat call you tunneler even if you decide to swap chase at every hook HAHA!

10/10 would tunnel survivors and flashlight baby-killers again.

I take back my original review. This game is hell and causes a negative impact on your mental health, playing killer is one of the most stressful things you can possibly do in this game and I'd only recommend it if you're in pique headspace, otherwise completely avoid killer and if you're absolutely dead certain on buying this game, get it on sale, it's not worth full price. 

Devs do. not. give. a. shit about you, all they want is your money. There has been an influx of hackers, cheaters and they're blatantly cheating because they know the devs won't do shit to ban or punish them for cheating. 

This game was once a pioneer, in multiplayer co-op horror, but now it's become a very horror itself, from bugs to horrendous server de-syncs, to survivors disconnecting because they don't like how you play, this game is an absolute shitshow and I would completely avoid it. If you have $20 don't spend it on this game, spend it on a horror classic like Silent Hill or Resident Evil.

Please, save yourselves before you buy this.

- Mamba.


///

Original review:

I absolutely love Dead By Daylight. This is one of the best survival horror/multiplayer games I've ever played. There's a very steep learning curve.

However I won't lie, the community at times, can be... well quite salty, now I'm not talking anywhere near the levels of League of Legends. Once you get past the salt, and understand where they come from (most of the time) the game is very enjoyable.

From famous killers from media such as Michael Myers, Demogorgan Ghostface, and much much more, the devs are constantly working on the game, updating and patching bugs and listening to the community to what they'd like added or nerfed within DbD.

I got this game as a result of a friend asking me if I had it, I said I didn't and I got it for the sh*ts n giggles. It was absolutely not a mistake, and I've loved every single moment I've played of my 65 hours I've played so far, in fact I've actually made new friends playing Dead By Daylight. 

TL;DR If you love horror games & the feeling of adrenaline rushing through your veins as you're being chased by a killer, while running for your life (in DbD) I would absolutely recommend this game for you.

Thank you all for reading my review, have a nice day :)

~Mamba

Очень хорошая игра,затягивает на долго.В ней есть как и плюсы,так и минусы.Из плюсов могу выделить атмосферу игры,музыкальное составляющее, жуткие звуки, мрачные локации.Так-же в игре есть и минусы:многовато багов ,много токсичных игроков.Игру сам рекомендую.
